text: Without LD: immediate Without LD: immediate CONRANDICTED \With LD- 6 hours CONRANDICATER Contraindicated for 4 weeks o after surgery; monitor neurologic Tirofiban (Aggrastat) IV infusion 48 hours CONTRAINDICATED status if given after neuraxial technique THROMBOLYTIC AGENTS Alteplase (TPA) 1 mg dose for catheter clearance CONTRAINDICATED Alteplase (TPA) Full dose for stroke, MI, etc EERIAREIEIED
